text: Khabees (Impure) auratein khabees mardon ke liye hain aur khabees (Impure) mard khabees (Impure) auraton ke liye. Paakeeza auratein pakeeza mardon ke liya hain aur pakeeza mard pakeeza auraton ke liye. Unka daaman paak hai un baaton se jo banane waley banate hain. Unke liye magfirat hai aur rizq e kareem
